body_html: Are you sure that RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 30141) exited unexpectedly with exit code 1. is the only error you get? You should be getting an error from the worker process as well as an error from the main loader process (the one you posted). My guess is that the one you get from the worker is something related to not properly wrapping things in if __name__ == '__main__': with spawn.

body: Are you sure that `RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 30141) exited unexpectedly with exit code 1.` is the only error you get? You should be getting an error from the worker process as well as an error from the main loader process (the one you posted). My guess is that the one you get from the worker is something related to not properly wrapping things in `if __name__ == '__main__':` with `spawn`.
